descriptionHtml:
[size=4]First,I don't speak English very much. So I can not answer the qustion much. Sorry.

This mod adds one Elf follower at Vilemyr Inn in Ivarstead.

Her name is "Sophia". She specializes in Conjuration and archery.

But,She is not strong much. If you added to her fellow,please support her.

Please spend a good adventure with her.[/size]



[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/56720-3-1407245807.jpg[/img]﻿
